thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Veleka Brown

author: Veleka Brown
title: Veleka Brown
text: The best experience ever for a person who hasn't purchased a car in in over 10 years. I was given a high amount for my raggedy trade in, and my payments are very cheap and reasonable. I would definitely refer friends and family to drive time to purchase a car. Speak up say what you want and express your limitations. I'm sure they will get you in the car you want and need. Signed with Love.
